text: Alfred Erich Senn (April 12, 1932 – March 8, 2016) was an American professor of history. He worked at the University of Wisconsin–Madison.Jungtinių Amerikos Valstijų Lietuviai: biografijų žinynas, Vol. 2 (Mokslo ir enciklopedijų leidybos institutas, 2002: ), p. 231. Senn was born in Madison, Wisconsin. Senn was the author of eight books. He taught about the history of Lithuania. Senn died in Madison, Wisconsin at the age of 83. ==References== ==Other websites== *Alfred Erich Senn – short bio Category:1932 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American historians Category:Academics from Wisconsin Category:Writers from Madison, Wisconsin
title: Alfred E. Senn
